Works very well in PCSX2 0.9.8.
Just enable DX10 as opposed to DX9 and go from there. I get 45 frames per second on a really low end graphics built-in Radeon HD4200. It slows down on certain cutscenes to where everyone sounds sort of drunk, but besides that it runs very, very smoothly.  If you don't have a modded PS2, then download PCSX2 on their site. Comes with plugins for it and everything. Kingdom Hearts works, Metal Gear solid 3 works [not as well], GTA works. Most games do, just depends on if it's DX9 or 10 really. You can get BIOS's for it on piratebay as well.
And if you want to play Gamecube and Wii games, get Dolphin, much more stable than PCSX2.
